handpicked.title: Disco Raja
handpicked.synopsis: Attacked and frozen to death, a dead man is revived by a group of doctors with the help of a technology that brings back dead people alive.

handpicked.title: Ala Vaikunthapurramuloo
handpicked.synopsis: A jealous clerk secretly switches his newborn son with his millionaire friend's temporarily stillborn son.

handpicked.title: Eureka
handpicked.synopsis: Yuva wants to complete his college course sooner and when he tries to put an end to the college festival lead by Revanth his life gets tossed when the latter ends up dead under mysterious circumstances.

handpicked.title: HIT
handpicked.synopsis: Vikram is a 30-year-old cop. While he is battling with his own traumatic past, the stakes get high when a girl called Preethi mysteriously disappears in Hyderabad and Vikram has to solve the case at any cost.

handpicked.title: Aswathama
handpicked.synopsis: A man works to uncover the details behind a series of crimes targeting women.

handpicked.title: Bheeshma
handpicked.synopsis: The film revolves around Bheeshma, a man making his living as a meme creator, who wants to remain single forever. But will he be able to?

handpicked.title: Entha Manchivaadavuraa
handpicked.synopsis: Balu loses both of his parents in his childhood and he grows up as an orphan. Because of this, he starts an organization named "All Is Well" to supply emotions to the needy.

handpicked.title: Sarileru Neekevvaru
handpicked.synopsis: A tough army major is deployed to Kurnool on a mission to keep the country safe from external threats.

handpicked.title: Palasa 1978
handpicked.synopsis: Mohan Rao and his elder brother face Pedda Shavukar and Chinna Shavukar, a political battle where low caste fights the high caste power.

handpicked.title: Raju Gari Kidnap
handpicked.synopsis: A desperate filmmaker Aravind, who just broke up with his girl kidnaps a film producer to narrate a film story, as he doesn't have any choice. How he able to convince him to make the film ...

handpicked.title: BomBhaat
handpicked.synopsis: An extremely unfortunate guy battling his destiny, stuck in a Love triangle, gets entangled in a decades old revenge saga between his God Father and a Mad scientist chasing a dangerous and extremely powerful formula.

handpicked.title: Falaknuma Das
handpicked.synopsis: Set in the backdrop of the colonies of falaknuma where a group of youngsters fall into unexpected consequences which lead them to a driving pathway of violence, brutality and ruthlessness.

handpicked.title: Nene mukyamantri
handpicked.synopsis: The movie will begin with a bump in the court of Chief Minister who rules the state politics. The current chief minister can not help him, but he does not want to help a star hero when he ...

handpicked.title: Gang Leader
handpicked.synopsis: Nani plays the gang leader of five women belonging to different age groups, helping them to plot revenge.

handpicked.title: Gaddalakonda Ganesh
handpicked.synopsis: An aspiring filmmaker who wants to direct a realistic story, stumbles upon a menacing villain and to learn the nitty-gritties of the villain's character, he puts his and his friend's life on the line.

handpicked.title: Sita
handpicked.synopsis: A four-year-old Ram is left in a monastery by a person named Anand Mohan and is promised that Sita will come to take care of him. Ram is innocent and cute. He makes Ram promise that he too,...

handpicked.title: Venky Mama
handpicked.synopsis: A story of nephew and a son which revolves around their emotions and village drama and army based story.

handpicked.title: iSmart Shankar
handpicked.synopsis: iSmart Shankar, starring Ram Pothineni and directed by Puri Jagannadh revolves around a hero who has another man's memory transferred into his head.

handpicked.title: Ranarangam
handpicked.synopsis: Deva (Sharwanand) is a powerful gangster from Visakhapatnam who moves to Spain to put his past behind him. But what happens when he realises he can't shake off his enemies no matter where he goes?

handpicked.title: Ayogya
handpicked.synopsis: A corrupt police officer finds his life changing when he takes on a case of gang rape.

handpicked.title: Bailampudi
handpicked.synopsis: Ravi (Harish Vinay), an auto driver falls for Kalyani (Tanishq Rajan) who happens to be the daughter of the village head Guru Narayan( Brahmanandareddy). The twist in the tale arises when Guru Narayan gets killed by Ravi. During his last breath, he reveals a secret about Kalyani which leaves Ravi stunned.

handpicked.title: Bigil
handpicked.synopsis: A former football player struggles to train a women's football team and avenge his father's death.

handpicked.title: Hippi
handpicked.synopsis: Hippi is about the live-in relationship between an energetic youngster and a confident girl.

handpicked.title: Kadaram Kondan
handpicked.synopsis: Vasu, a young medico, after rescuing one of his patients from a murder attempt finds out that his pregnant wife is abducted, and the kidnappers demand the patient he saved in exchange for her safety.

handpicked.title: Operation Gold Fish
handpicked.synopsis: A group of commandos set out on a mission to find and eliminate a mysterious terrorist mastermind called Gold Fish in the Kashmir valley.

handpicked.title: Sakala Kala Vallabhudu
handpicked.synopsis: Sakala Kala Vallabhudu is a Telugu movie starring Tanishq Reddy, Meghla Muktha in prominent roles. It is a commercial entertainer directed by Shiva Ganesh.

handpicked.title: Dev
handpicked.synopsis: Dev, a youngster from a well-to-do family, is an adventure seeker. When his friend playfully tries to set him up with Meghna, a businesswoman who has no time for love, Dev has to embark on an adventure of another kind.
